description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.oOLt78NIxjPCGfVp]{Delayed Blast Fireball}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.RqOlpuSV1fN3c8Hv]{Mind of Rage}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.9zfBm1GyIg7dxJjc]{Phantom Reality}
